short.ko: 웹 페이지의 전체 페이지 스크린 샷을 한 번 클릭하십시오. 전체 페이지를 쉽게 캡처하십시오

short.lv: Viens noklikšķiniet uz pilnas lapas ekrānuzņēmumiem jebkurā tīmekļa vietnē. Ar viegli uztveriet pilnas lapas
short.ml: ഏതെങ്കിലും വെബ്പേജിന്റെ മുഴുവൻ പേജ് സ്ക്രീൻഷോട്ടുകളും ക്ലിക്കുചെയ്യുക. എളുപ്പത്തിൽ മുഴുവൻ പേജുകളും ക്യാപ്ചർ ചെയ്യുക
short.mr: कोणत्याही वेबपृष्ठाच्या पूर्ण पृष्ठावरील स्क्रीनशॉट क्लिक करा. सहजतेने पूर्ण पृष्ठे कॅप्चर करा

short.ro: Un singur clic pe pagina completă capturi de ecran ale oricărei pagini web. Capturați paginile complete cu ușurință

short.sl: Eno kliknite posnetke zaslona na celotni strani katere koli spletne strani. Zajem polne strani z lahkoto
short.sr: Један кликните снимке за снимање свих страница било које веб странице. Снимите пуне странице са лакоћом

short.ta: எந்தவொரு வலைப்பக்கத்தின் முழு பக்க ஸ்கிரீன் ஷாட்களையும் ஒரு கிளிக் செய்க. முழு பக்கங்களையும் எளிதில் பிடிக்கவும்

short.vi: Một lần nhấp vào ảnh chụp màn hình trang đầy đủ của bất kỳ trang web nào. Nắm bắt các trang đầy đủ một cách dễ dàng
short.zh_CN: 一单击任何网页的全页屏幕截图。轻松捕获完整的页面

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Capture full page screenshots of any webpage

Looking for a quick and easy way to take full-page screenshots of websites? Look no further than the Full-Page Screenshot extension. This free extension allows you to capture high-quality screenshots of entire web pages, including areas that are not visible on the screen. 

 

Key Features of Full-Page screenshot: 

>>Takes high-quality screenshots of entire web pages, including areas that are not visible on the screen 
>>Saves screenshots as PNG and JPG files  
>>Completely free to use 
>>Easy user interface 

How to Use: 

>>Install the Full-Page Screenshot extension 
>>Once installed, click on the extension icon in your browser toolbar to open the extension. 
>>Click the "Capture" button to take the screenshot. 
>>Save the screenshot as a PNG or JPG file 

 
Why Is It Useful? 

Here are some reasons why this extension is useful: 

>>Capture Entire Web Pages: The Full-Page Screenshot extension allows users to capture high-quality screenshots of entire web pages, including areas that are not visible on the screen. 

>>Easy to Use: It is easy to use, with a simple interface and intuitive controls. 

>>Ideal for Professionals: The extension is particularly useful for professionals such as designers, developers, and content creators who need to capture and share screenshots of web pages for work purposes.
long.en,en_AU:
Capture full page screenshots of any webpage

Looking for a quick and easy way to take full-page screenshots of websites? Look no further than the Full-Page Screenshot extension. This free extension allows you to capture high-quality screenshots of entire web pages, including areas that are not visible on the screen. 

This extension includes a feature where, upon clicking the BAB popup, users are prompted to install an additional extension (advertisement).



Key Features of Full-Page screenshot: 

>>Takes high-quality screenshots of entire web pages, including areas that are not visible on the screen 
>>Saves screenshots as PNG and JPG files  
>>Completely free to use 
>>Easy user interface 

How to Use: 

>>Install the Full-Page Screenshot extension 
>>Once installed, click on the extension icon in your browser toolbar to open the extension. 
>>Click the "Capture" button to take the screenshot. 
>>Save the screenshot as a PNG or JPG file 

Why Is It Useful? 

Here are some reasons why this extension is useful: 

>>Capture Entire Web Pages: The Full-Page Screenshot extension allows users to capture high-quality screenshots of entire web pages, including areas that are not visible on the screen. 

>>Easy to Use: It is easy to use, with a simple interface and intuitive controls. 

>>Ideal for Professionals: The extension is particularly useful for professionals such as designers, developers, and content creators who need to capture and share screenshots of web pages for work purposes.
